main event: An object was observed in the sky with a pulsating and flickering nature, estimated to be traveling at 1000 to 1500 mph for about 5 to 10 seconds before disappearing from sight.
interesting points: The object was visualized from the ground,Surrounding air turbulence may have caused excessive flickering,The initial observation lasted only 5 to 10 seconds,The object was concluded to possibly be a balloon or an airborne object,Insufficient data was available for a comprehensive evaluation.
witness description: the observer saw the object overhead
